## Events.TrashcanOpen class

Notifies listeners when the trashcan is opening or closing.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare class TrashcanOpen extends UiBase 
```
**Extends:** [UiBase](./blockly.events.uibase.md)

|  --- | --- | --- | --- |
|  [isOpen?](./blockly.events.trashcanopen.isopen.md) |  | boolean | _(Optional)_ True if the trashcan is currently opening (previously closed). False if it is currently closing (previously open). |
